title: Calories in a Serving of Sour Cream
meta_description: Discover calories in a sour cream serving (1 tbsp), including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for your diet tracking.
h1: Calories in a Serving of Sour Cream
assumptions: Full-fat sour cream, standard serving of 1 tablespoon (about 12 g), plain without additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fat content, and portion size; always check product labels for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of sour cream provides about 24 kcal, mostly from fat.

label_note: Values align with standard Nutrition Facts panels for quick reference and comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a sour cream tablespoon?
faqs.a: About 24 kcal for 1 tbsp of full-fat sour cream.

faqs.q: Is sour cream high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 1 tbsp has 2.4 g total fat, including 1.5 g saturated.
Typically 12 kcal per tbsp, half the fat of full-fat.
Minimal, about 0.5 g per tbsp, mostly from lactose.

faqs.q: How much protein in a serving of sour cream?
faqs.a: Very little, around 0.3 g per 1 tbsp.
